00027 // DEBUG ONLY - Sets the error reporting level to the highest possible value
00028 #error_reporting( E_ALL | E_STRICT );
00029 
00030 /**
00031  * Class manager
00032  * 
00033  * This class will handle every request to a class from this project,
00034  * by automatically loading the class file (thanx to the SPL).
00035  *
00036  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00037  * @version     1.0
00038  * @package     TYPO3
00039  * @subpackage  oop
00040  */
00041 final class tx_oop_Core_ClassManager
00042 {
00043     /**
00044      * The unique instance of the class (singleton)
00045      */
00046     private static $_instance = NULL;
00047     
00048     /**
00049      * The loaded classes from this project
00050      */
00051     private $_loadedClasses   = array();
00052     
00053     /**
00054      * The available top packages
00055      */
00056     private $_packages        = array();
00057     
00058     /**
00059      * The directory which contains the classes
00060      */
00061     private $_classDir        = '';
00062     
00063     /**
00064      * Class constructor
00065      * 
00066      * The class constructor is private to avoid multiple instances of the
00067      * class (singleton).
00068      * 
00069      * @return NULL
00070      */
00071     private function __construct()
00072     {
00073         // Stores the directory containing the classes
00074         $this->_classDir = realpath( dirname( __FILE__ ) . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . '..' )
00075                          . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR;
00076         
00077         // Creates a directory iterator in the directory containing this file
00078         $dirIterator     = new DirectoryIterator( $this->_classDir );
00079         
00080         // Process each directory
00081         foreach( $dirIterator as $file ) {
00082             
00083             // Checks if the file is a PHP class file
00084             if( substr( $file, strlen( $file ) - 10 ) === '.class.php' ) {
00085                 
00086                 // Stores the file name, with it's full path
00087                 $this->_packages[ ( string )$file ] = $file->getPathName();
00088                 
00089                 // Process the next file
00090                 continue;
00091             }
00092             
00093             // Checks if the file is a directory
00094             if( !$file->isDir() ) {
00095                 
00096                 // File - Process the next file
00097                 continue;
00098             }
00099             
00100             // Checks if the directory is hidden
00101             if( substr( $file, 0, 1 ) === '.' ) {
00102                 
00103                 // Hidden - Process the next file
00104                 continue;
00105             }
00106             
00107             // Stores the directory name, with it's full path
00108             $this->_packages[ ( string )$file ] = $file->getPathName();
00109         }
00110     }
00111     
00112     /**
00113      * Clones an instance of the class
00114      * 
00115      * A call to this method will produce an exception, as the class cannot
00116      * be cloned (singleton).
00117      * 
00118      * @return  NULL
00119      * @throws  tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception Always, as the class cannot be cloned (singleton)
00120      */
00121     public function __clone()
00122     {
00123         throw new tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception(
00124             'Class ' . __CLASS__ . ' cannot be cloned',
00125             tx_oop_Core_Singleton_Exception::EXCEPTION_CLONE
00126         );
00127     }
00128     
00129     /**
00130      * Gets the unique class instance
00131      * 
00132      * This method is used to get the unique instance of the class
00133      * (singleton). If no instance is available, it will create it.
00134      * 
00135      * @return  tx_oop_Core_ClassManager    The unique instance of the class
00136      */
00137     public static function getInstance()
00138     {
00139         // Checks if the unique instance already exists
00140         if( !is_object( self::$_instance ) ) {
00141             
00142             // Creates the unique instance
00143             self::$_instance = new self();
00144         }
00145         
00146         // Returns the unique instance
00147         return self::$_instance;
00148     }
00149     
00150     /**
00151      * SPL autoload method
00152      * 
00153      * When registered with the spl_autoload_register() function, this method
00154      * will be called each time a class cannot be found, and will try to
00155      * load it.
00156      * 
00157      * @param   string  The name of the class to load
00158      * @return  boolean
00159      * @see     getInstance
00160      * @see     _loadClass
00161      */
00162     public static function autoLoad( $className )
00163     {
00164         // Instance of this class
00165         static $instance = NULL;
00166         
00167         // Checks if the instance of the class has already been fetched
00168         if( !is_object( $instance ) ) {
00169             
00170             // Gets the instance of this class
00171             $instance = self::getInstance();
00172         }
00173         
00174         // Checks if the class belongs to the 'tx_oop' package
00175         if( substr( $className, 0, 7 ) === 'tx_oop_' ) {
00176             
00177             // Gets the class root package
00178             $rootPkg = substr( $className, 7, strpos( $className, '_', 7 ) - 7 );
00179             
00180             // Checks if the requested class belongs to this project
00181             if( isset( $instance->_packages[ $rootPkg ] )
00182                 || isset( $instance->_packages[ $className . '.class.php' ] )
00183             ) {
00184                 
00185                 // Loads the class
00186                 return $instance->_loadClass( $className );
00187                 
00188             }
00189         }
00190         
00191         // The requested class does not belong to this project
00192         return false;
00193     }
00194     
00195     /**
00196      * Loads a class from this project
00197      * 
00198      * @param   string  The name of the class to load
00199      * @return  boolean
00200      */
00201     private function _loadClass( $className )
00202     {
00203         // Gets the class path
00204         $classPath = $this->_classDir
00205                    . str_replace( '_', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, substr( $className, 7 ) )
00206                    . '.class.php';
00207         
00208         // Checks if the class file exists
00209         if( file_exists( $classPath ) ) {
00210             
00211             // Includes the class file
00212             require_once( $classPath );
00213         
00214             // Checks if the class is defined
00215             if( !class_exists( $className ) ) {
00216                 
00217                 // Error message
00218                 $errorMsg = 'The class '
00219                           . $className
00220                           . ' is not defined in file '
00221                           . $classPath;
00222                 
00223                 // The class is not defined
00224                 trigger_error( $errorMsg, E_USER_ERROR );
00225                 
00226                 // Prints the error message and exits the script, as Drupal will intercept the error message
00227                 print $errorMsg;
00228                 exit();
00229             }
00230             
00231             // Adds the class to the loaded classes array
00232             $this->_loadedClasses[ $className ] = $classPath;
00233             
00234             // Class was successfully loaded
00235             return true;
00236         }
00237         
00238         // Class file was not found
00239         return false;
00240     }
00241     
00242     /**
00243      * Gets the loaded classes from this project
00244      * 
00245      * @return  array   An array with the loaded classes
00246      */
00247     public function getLoadedClasses()
00248     {
00249         // Returns the loaded classes from this project
00250         return $this->_loadedClasses;
00251     }
00252 }
